name: Quick Pasta with Salmon and Tomatoes in Cream Sauce
author: Sabsi
summary: This is my favorite pasta dish made with fresh salmon and tomatoes in a cream sauce. If you want to reduce the calories, you can use milk for part of the cream, but believe me, with cream it is to die for!
ingredients: 10 ounces salmon fillet, cut into cubes
1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat while spaghetti is cooking and cook salmon and garlic until salmon is lightly browned, about 5 minutes
Add tomatoes and basil, season with salt and pepper, and cook for 3 minutes
Pour in cream and simmer over low heat until flavors are well combined and salmon is cooked through, about 10 minutes
